faq.question: What ages/grades do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept children from LKG to 9th grade. Placement depends on prior learning.

faq.question: When are classes held?
faq.answer: We run a flexible 2-day week model with options on timings. Contact us for the current timetable.

faq.question: How do I apply?
faq.answer: Fill out the registration form on the 'Registration' section. We'll contact you with next steps.

faq.question: What curriculum do you follow?
faq.answer: We combine the British curriculum (Maths, Science, English) with Quran, Qaida and Arabic lessons.
